pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.4_0: “yatheva mayaṁ sapajāpatikā nāvāya kīḷāma, evamevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya nāvāya kīḷantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.6_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.8_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.11_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.13_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.14.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruheyya, uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:1.15_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.3_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.5_0: “Na, bhaginī, kappati bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhituṁ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.6_0: tumhe vā paṭhamaṁ uttaratha mayaṁ vā uttarissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.9_0: Atha kho tāsaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ pacchā uttarantīnaṁ corā acchindiṁsu ca dūsesuñca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.10_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.13_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.14_0: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiriyaṁ taraṇāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.15_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:2.16.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruheyya uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.10_2: ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā abhiruhāmā”ti saṁvidahati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.11_0: Bhikkhuniyā abhiruḷhe bhikkhu abhiruhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.12_0: Bhikkhumhi abhiruḷhe bhikkhunī abhiruhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.20_0: Kukkuṭasampāte gāme, gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.1.21_0: Agāmake araññe, aḍḍhayojane aḍḍhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.1_0: Saṁvidahite saṁvidahitasaññī ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.2_0: Saṁvidahite vematiko ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.3_0: Saṁvidahite asaṁvidahitasaññī ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc28:3.2.4_0: Bhikkhu saṁvidahati, bhikkhunī na saṁvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
